title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 2X GTA$ and RP on Slasher
content:
Stalk a team of up to seven Hunted as the Slasher, armed with a shotgun. After three minutes, the dynamic shifts as the Hunted become the hunters, receiving shotguns of their own. Both sides of this conflict walk away with Double Rewards all week long.

Jump into the action by entering the Featured Series in Legion Square or by navigating to Adversary Modes in the Pause Menu.
